definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :2Ki 2:19 seat, assembly, dwelling-place, dwelling dwellers;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ps 107:4 + 4 t.; cstr. [[מוֹשַׁב]] Ex 12:40 + 9 t.; sf. [[מוֹשָׁבִי]] Job 29:7 etc.; pl. cstr. [[מוֹשְׁבֵי]] Ez Eze 34:13; sf. 2 mpl. [[מוֹשְׁבׂתֵיכֶם]] etc. Ex 12:20 + 11 t.; sf. 3 mpl. [[מוֹשְׁבׂחָם]] etc. Ex 10:23 + 5 t.; [[מוֹשְׁבׂחֵיהֶס]] Ez Eze 37:23, but read ´[[מְשׁוּב]] their apostasies LXX Comm., see VB; [[מוֹשְׁבוֹתֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 6:14; —

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sitting = those sitting, sitting company or assembly, [[מוֹשַׁב]] [[עֲבָדָיו]] 1Ki 10:5 (‖[[מַעֲמַד מְשָֽׁרְתָיו]]) = 2Ch 9:4; so Ps 1:1, Ps 107:32 (‖[[קהל]]).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: dwelling-place of people tribe, etc., oft.= terriotory, district, or later, city; Ge 10:39, Ge 27:39 (both J), Ex 10:23 (E), Nu 24:21 (JE), Ge 36:43 (P), Ez Eze 6:14, Eze 48:15, 1Ch 4:33, 1Ch 6:39, 1Ch 7:28; [[הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[מ]] Ex 34:13 = habitable places of the land; distinct from city [[עָרֵיהֶם בְּמוֹשְׁבׂחָם]] Nu 31:10, cf. Ez Eze 6:6, but also [[עִיר מוֹשָׁב]] Ps 107:4, Ps 107:7, Ps 107:36; of Zion as ´[[י]] ´[[מ]] Ps 132:13.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: alm. = abstr. dwelling [[עַיר בֵּית מוֹשַׁב]] Le 25:29 (P); ´[[אֶרֶץ מ]] Nu 15:2 land of your dwelling-places or dwelling (P).
situation of city 2Ki 2:19; location of image Ez Eze 8:3.
coll. = those dwelling, ´[[כּׂל מוֹשַׁב וני]] 2Sa 9:12 all those dwelling in the house of Ṣiba.—Ez Eze 37:28 v. supr. and [[מְשׁוּבָה]] sub [[שׁוּב]].
